changes:
## 2.0.0
- Auto-suggest students registered in the course
- Use a typeahead input field for students
- Prevent logging student interactions with a student that doesn't exist.

## 1.7.0
- Add interaction counter

## 1.6.1
- Allow admins to download feedback as CSV

## 1.6.0
- Add announcement system

## 1.5.0
- Add comment sentiment tracking
- Add feedback request count to admin page

## 1.4.10
- Prevent submitting sentences
- Attach tooltip to username field

## 1.4.9
- Display feedback count on admin table

## 1.4.8
- Add interaction type tracking
- Prevent duplicate interaction tracking

## 1.4.7
- Allow viewing stats as a non-admin

## 1.4.6
- Add stats to admin table

## 1.4.5
- Adjust student form wording
- Fix LA adjustments for admins
- Fix Z index for modals

## 1.4.4
- Add interaction count table

## 1.4.3
- Compress bundled JavaScript to increase load times

## 1.4.2
- Allow multiple students at once
- Don't reload on form submit
- Modify NavBar styles
- Clear student CSE on submit (prevents double submits)

## 1.4.1
- Format date-times on the backend
- Reduce package size
- Fix LA name requirement checker
- Update name locally when backend changes
- Fix default course loading
- Fix searching on paginated tables

## 1.4.0
- Fix LAs being able to login as Admins
- Fix Admins
- Allow LA settings page to reflect name/course requests
- Fix 'Invalid Course' bug
- Fix admin page search bar when on an alternate page
- Fix updating of active page when modifying the sort
- Correct what is available to non-admins
- Allow LA form changes to be reflected in backend calls
- Send LA name in email to students
- Error based on invalid LA username
- Added accessibility features to main forms
- Fix version modal button layout
- Don't show CSE usernames for individuals without interactions on admin table

## 1.3.3
- Make pagination row responsive to the length of the table
- Limit longer decimal point values
- Correct importing of numbers

## 1.3.2
- Convert Bootstrap to npm module
- Search admin table => case-insensitive
- Fix modal close buttons
- Paginate long tables

## 1.3.1
- Prevent self-interacting

## 1.3.0
- Chart interactions based on hour of the day
- Display the average feedback for the last 7 days based on course

## 1.2.1
- Highlight borderline ratings in admin table

## 1.2.0
- Convert to app state management (using Zustand)
- Implement Dispatch
- Add version check

## 1.1.2
- Mark low ratings on admin table

## 1.1.1
- Allow dismissing changelog modal with navbar button

## 1.1.0
- Animate feedback responses

## 1.0.0
- Display Version and Changelog in NavBar
- Make admin table searchable, filterable, and sortable
- Allow LAs to modify their name and default course
- Allow admins to modify the names and default courses of all LAs
- Add time stamp to rating table on admin panel
- Accept willingness to be contacted from students
- Redesign form and thank you pages
- Display real names (instead of CSE usernames) of LAs on admin and form pages
- Add context to ratings on form

## 0.1.0
- Initial release
